name: Demand Solutions Group
tag_list: on-demand, saas, netsuite, salesforce-com, intacct, erp, crm
overview:
Demand Solutions Group (DSG) is an organization of business and technology professionals that helps companies operate more efficiently through the application of on-demand (or web-based), technology.

We implement and support NetSuite, Salesforce.com, Intacct and RightNow. As testament to the quality of our services we were recently named â€œKiller VARâ€ by WebCPA-Accounting Technology.

DSG leverages its deep experience in CRM, ERP and finance, coupled with extensive on-demand application knowledge, to help companies define their business needs, identify business solutions, and determine how on-demand technology and services can be used to improve their bottom line.

The advent of on-demand applications has created a need and an opportunity for a different approach to business applications. No longer does the work surrounding business applications have to focus on the engineering aspects of the application. Instead the focus is on driving business value from the application into the organization in a rapid, cost effective and continuous manner.

On-demand applications allow service providers to spend more time ensuring processes and people are set up to drive real, measurable value into the company.
